products.name: Dainty Edge To Edge Tempered Glass for Realme X
products.description: FULL GLUE and NO DOTS, BUBBLES & RAINBOW EFFECT - It has full glue on the entire screen which leaves no dots, no rainbow effect and no bubbles post application of the tempered glass. The tempered glass has strong UV silicon.
